com.punchline.javalib.entities

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Renderable, Transform, Velocity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedSprite, Animation, Body, Particle, Sprite, StatBar

    public interface Component
    Base interface for components.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdd(ComponentManager container)
      Called when this Component is added to a ComponentManager.
      void onRemove(ComponentManager container)
      Called when this Component is removed from a ComponentManager.

        Called when this Component is removed from a ComponentManager.
